param.label: Number of nodes
param.name: nodes
param.help: Number of processing cores, 'ppn' value (1-12). Leave default value if not sure.

param.label: Number of tasks per node
param.name: ntasks-per-node
param.help: Number of tasks per processing core, 'ppn' value (1-16). Leave default value if not sure.

param.label: Memory
param.name: memory
param.help: Memory size in gigabytes, 'pmem' value (1-900). Leave default value if not sure.

param.label: Time
param.name: time
param.help: Maximum job time in hours, 'walltime' value (1-672) or 28 days. Leave default value if not sure.

param.label: Project
param.name: project
param.help: Project to assign resource allocation to.
